    • Method Detail

      • listFilesFlat

        public static List<File> listFilesFlat(File folder)
        Return the set of files and folders contained directly under the parent folder. If the parent folder does not exist or is empty, return an empty list.
        Parameters:
        folder - The parent folder.
        Returns:
        The set of files and folders contained directly under the parent folder.

      • listFilesFlat

        public static List<File> listFilesFlat(File folder,
                       FileFilter filter)
        Return the set of files and folders contained directly under the parent folder. If the parent folder does not exist or is empty, return an empty list. Setting a filter to null is the same as Filter.all().
        Parameters:
        folder - The parent folder.
        filter - A file filter.
        Returns:
        The set of files and folders contained directly under the parent folder.
        See Also:
        Filter

      • listFilesDeep

        public static List<File> listFilesDeep(File file,
                       FileFilter filter,
                       FileFilter dirFilter)
        Return the set of files and folders under the parent file recursively (deep). Setting a filter to null is the same as Filter.all().
        Parameters:
        file - Either a file or a folder.
        filter - A file filter. This is applied after the walking the entire tree to include or exclude files on an individual basis.
        dirFilter - A file filter. This is applied to directories as the tree is being walked to determine if they are recursed or ignored. If this filter does not accept a directory, it and all of its children will not be considered further.
        Returns:
        The set of files and folder under the parent file recursively (deep).
        See Also:
        Filter
